author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Alnylam Reports New Clinical Results From The Apollo Phase 3 Study Of Patisiran
text:
Alnylam Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* ALNYLAM REPORTS NEW CLINICAL RESULTS FROM THE APOLLO PHASE 3 STUDY OF PATISIRAN AT THE AMERICAN ACADEMY OF NEUROLOGY 2018 ANNUAL MEETING
* ALNYLAM PHARMA - IN NEW POST-HOC ANALYSIS, PATISIRAN REDUCED COMPOSITE RATE OF ALL-CAUSE HOSPITALIZATION, MORTALITY BY ABOUT 50%, RELATIVE TO PLACEBO
* ALNYLAM PHARMACEUTICALS INC - PATISIRAN DEMONSTRATED IMPROVEMENT IN MULTIPLE QUALITY OF LIFE MEASURES, COMPARED TO PLACEBO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
